description: This file contains CSS styles for the React frontend application, including theme management with CSS variables for light and dark themes and styling for various components.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application component style with center alignment and background coloring based on theme.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Style for the App logo with animations based on user preferences.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header component styling, including background color, font size, and display properties.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the App component, featuring color transition effects.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button style for toggling between themes, including transitions and hover effects.

methods.name: @keyframes App-logo-spin
methods.description: Defines the animation for spinning the App logo.
